body: Hi i can't connect to Avicus. It freezes saying 'Downloading Terrain' yet all other servers i try work, also my Brother can get on fine! And he has different account an stuff! Please help been doing this for 2 days :( Please gimme tips!
body_tagged: Hi i can't connect to Avicus. It freezes saying 'Downloading Terrain' yet all other servers i try work, also my Brother can get on fine! And he has different account an stuff! Please help been doing this for 2 days :( Please gimme tips!
title: PLEASE HELP! Cant Connect :(

replies.body: Try using direct connects until it works.
replies.body_tagged: Try using direct connects until it works.

replies.body:
To be more specific, I'll give you some alternate IPs:
- nexus01.avic.us
- mczone02.avic.us
- walls01.avic.us
- cronus.avic.us
Have a nice day :)

replies.body: I get that too. You have to wait like 4 minutes.
replies.body_tagged: I get that too. You have to wait like 4 minutes.

replies.body: You sometimes do have to wait a while, but eventually it'll finish loading terrain. Alternatively, as others have said, try using direct IPs.
